channel.title: Shirley Henderson on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Shirley Henderson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Glenrothan’ Review: Brian Cox’s Scotland-Set Directorial Debut Combats Sibling-Drama Clichés With Good Acting
item.description: Alan Cumming, Alexandra Shipp and Shirley Henderson co-star in the drama about estranged brothers reuniting, which premiered in Toronto.
